description: A fantastic one bedroom first floor apartment with hardwood floors and well equipped kitchen, very conveniently located to Prospect Park subway station (B and Q lines). The apartment is approximately 20 minutes away from Manhattan and just a short walk away from trendy cafes, bars and restaurants.
name: 1 Bedroom Apartment right next to Prospect Park
review: The host is just wonderful helpful and always willing to help, the place is clean and easy access to different spots in the city, my stay is a great experience.
